tool_description: The Paraphrasing API is a simple tool to rephrase any text content, or to track down better approaches to communicate individual sentences, expressions or words. Whether you want to scramble text content for a site, business report(document), summary, email or tweet, this API gets the job done quick.
name: Paraphrasing Lab
title: Paraphrasing Lab

api_list.name: Rewrite
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrasing-lab.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrasing-lab.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrasing-lab.p.rapidapi.com/api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrasing-lab.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
